name: Security Violation Penalty
description: Civil penalty for failing to maintain reasonable safeguards (per violation).

name: Notification Violation Penalty
description: Civil penalty for failing to notify residents (capped at $250k).

name: Statute of Limitations
description: Action must be brought within 3 years of notice or 6 years of breach.

name: Inadvertent Disclosure
description: Good faith access by employee that does not result in further disclosure.

name: Unauthorized Access
description: Viewing communicating altering or using data without authorization.
